feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.3.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: use repository for apiKeys list query & caching in /settings/developer/api-keys RSC by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21776
  • fix: apply user timeZone for Event Trends on /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21787
  • fix: Updates to HitPay app by @MuhammadAimanSulaiman in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21175
  • fix: hovering over insights tab does not show pointer by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21772
  • feat: api v2 get google-calendar event details by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21336
  • feat: enable transcription automatically by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21691
  • feat: support updating cal video settings in API v2 by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21784
  • feat: restructure org pages based on permission levels by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21611
  • fix: ensure failed apiv2 slots workers are terminated by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21797
  • chore: Remove cascade on profile deletion for EventType by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21792
  • chore: move logics to FilterSegmentRepository by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21648
  • feat: add api v2 endpoints for cal video by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21775
  • chore: Org Team workflows endpoints [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21329
  • feat: platform toggle calendar event creation by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21788
  • fix: slots rescheduleUid by @weknowyourgame in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21626
  • feat: Restrict same email to create more than 'n' active bookings atâ€¦ by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21745
  • refactor: Do not consider event type id in idempotency key by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21681
  • feat: Allow reschedule when max booker bookings have been reached by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21778

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.3.12...v5.3.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: ux improve for seats input by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21815
  • perf: remove 2 DB fetches by removing getFacetedValues by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21808
  • fix: Few flaky e2e test by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21818
  • fix: getBookings for team admins within orgs by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.3.13...v5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: duplicate workflow reminders caused by scanWorkflowBody by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21767
  • fix: attendee could not reschedule or cancel unconfirmed events directly from the email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21844
  • docs: v2 cancelling seated booking as a host by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21744
  • chore: Auto review seeded orgs by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21856
  • fix: v2 event type disable guests by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21753
  • docs: expand Google Calendar event ID description with API endpoint references by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21857
  • feat: optimize Prisma queries by replacing findFirst with findUnique where applicable by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21826
  • fix: replyTo includes the correct email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21843
  • fix: event type settings atom not saving by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21864
  • chore: add global prefix to api v2 via env variable for selfhost by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21860

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.0...v5.4.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Add Guests dialog for Bookings by @nerdberg792 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21669
  • refactor: seated booking reschedule error message by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21841
  • feat: Headless router - queue recording booking response by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21805
  • fix: Dry run in prerender flow by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21876
  • chore: Add logging to check max active bookings for booker by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21874

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.1...v5.4.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: update trigger function for RoutingFormResponseField by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21868
  • fix: GCal - change to OR operator by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21881
  • perf: deduplicating DB fetches + leverage unique DB index for team type booking page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21811
  • perf: leverage DB index for user profile fetching (booking page & payment page) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21814
  • fix: microsoft oAuth in api/v2 by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21890
  • fix: Dry Run for non-pre-render scenario by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21893
  • fix: 'handles OOO correctly' test fail in non-UTC servertime by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21899
  • fix: height of buttons in overrides list by @Adarsh9977 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21898
  • test: add unit tests to various important fns in routing flow by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21902
  • feat: disable transcription setting in cal video by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21755
  • perf: improve invalid app credential query by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21909
  • fix: alignment of delete button on hover at event-types by @Adarsh9977 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21884
  • fix: Banner uploader fix error handling and reduce image size jump by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21903
  • fix: Add comment for an error case in onboarding by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21920

New Contributors

  • @Adarsh9977 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21898

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.2...v5.4.3
